hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: I specialize in code optimization, full-stack application development with high performance, and modernizing legacy software systems.
services.title: Professional Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive software development solutions tailored to your needs
services.offering.title: What We Offer
services.offering.aiCodeImprovement.desc: Transform AI-generated code into clean, extensible, production-ready solutions. Reduce technical debt, security risks, and future maintenance costs.
services.offering.fullCycle.title: Full Cycle Development
services.offering.fullCycle.desc: Complete software development and deployment from design through production. End-to-end project management ensuring quality at every phase.
services.offering.optimization.title: Performance & Cost Optimization
services.offering.optimization.desc: Accelerate your product's speed and efficiency. Increase user adoption while significantly reducing operational and infrastructure costs.
services.offering.consulting.title: Architecture & Strategy Consulting
services.offering.consulting.desc: Expert guidance on solutions, processes, and architecture patterns tailored to your software and business objectives.
services.web.title: Web Development
services.web.desc: Building modern, responsive web applications with the latest technologies and best practices.
services.app.title: App Development
services.app.desc: Creating full-featured applications with excellent performance, user experience, and reliability.
services.cloud.title: Cloud Services
services.cloud.desc: Leveraging cloud infrastructure for scalability, reliability, and cost-effective solutions.
services.optimization.title: Performance Optimization
services.optimization.desc: Improving application performance, reducing load times, and optimizing resource usage.
services.design.title: UI/UX Design
services.design.desc: Crafting intuitive, visually appealing interfaces that provide excellent user experiences.
services.consulting.title: Tech Consulting
services.consulting.desc: Strategic guidance on technology choices, architecture, and best practices for your projects.
about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am a professional software developer with 5+ years of experience in building scalable, high-performance applications.
about.intro2: My expertise spans across full-stack development, cloud architecture, and performance optimization.
about.desc: I am passionate about building high-quality applications, optimizing code for maximum performance, and helping businesses reduce operational costs. With a focus on clean code and best practices, I deliver solutions that not only meet your requirements but exceed your expectations.

contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project? Let's discuss your requirements and create something amazing together.
